courseName: Digital Manufacturing of Advanced Materials MSc
description: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Digital Manufacturing of Advanced Materials MSc will equip you with interdisciplinary skills highly sought after by industry and academia. You will gain the abilities needed to develop and produce advanced materials such as new drug molecules and pharmaceuticals, materials for energy generation and storage, catalysts facilitating sustainable processes, functional nanomaterials for precious metal recovery or biomedical applications, and more.
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
